mapper.select: SELECT style_seq, style_name, style_gender, style_time, style_price, style_intro, style_image, a.cate_seq,cate_name FROM T_HAIRSTYLE a INNER JOIN T_CATEGORY b ON a.cate_seq = b.cate_seq WHERE a.shop_seq=#{shop_seq} ORDER BY a.cate_seq, style_price DESC, style_name, style_time DESC, style_gender
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_HAIRSTYLE (style_name, style_gender, style_time, style_price, style_intro, shop_seq, cate_seq) VALUES (#{style_name},#{style_gender},#{style_time},#{style_price},#{style_intro},#{shop_seq}, #{cate_seq})
